hints.text: Welcome to the first real puzzle! First you will be guided through how puzzles work.
At the top of the screen you can see (from left) the Truth Table, Check Logic button and the Objective.
The Truth Table is shown on hover. It shows what input is required for a given output.
The Check Logic (Play) button checks your current creation against the truth table to determine if it satisfies the objective.
The Objective is shown on hover and tells you in plain text what the puzzle requires.
That is it! Give it a try on this puzzle and good luck on your Boolean journey!
